attributes.action: take back into public ownership the gas, water and electricity companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that Centrica has forecast an obscene rise in costs to the consumer, the government should think the unthinkable and save the consumer from rapine exploitation by these ravenous companies.
Think true socialist ideals and rid us of the John Lewis List mentality that encourages private companies to mimic the greed of MPs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
